phrases.phrase: 어머니 배 속에서 배워 가지고 나오다
meanings: come out of one's mother's womb with the knowledge of something

vlive.korean: 어머니의 무릎처럼... Just like my mother's lap. 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
어머니 판타지시라고요? Your mother is a member of FANTASY? 듣기 View video SF9 : 🍀🍀
vlive.english: Your mother is a member of FANTASY?

vlive.korean: 그러니까 어머니시군요! So I guess you are a mother yourself! 듣기 View video SF9 : 🍀🍀
vlive.english: So I guess you are a mother yourself!

vlive.korean: 약간 어머니나 아버지가 좋게 보시는! or have good impression of us? 듣기 View video SF9 : 🍀🍀
vlive.english: or have good impression of us?

vlive.korean: SF9 어머니랑 같이 본다 하는 사람 있어요? Anyone? Who's watching SF9 V LIVEs with their mum? 듣기 View video SF9 : 🍀🍀
vlive.english: Anyone? Who's watching SF9 V LIVEs with their mum?

examples.korean: He was soundly beaten by his mother. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 어머니에게 호되게 맞았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was soundly beaten by his mother. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My mother underwent major surgery last year. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 어머니께서는 작년에 대수술을 받으셨다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My mother underwent major surgery last year. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He grabbed Ben, wrenching him away from his mother. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 벤을 움켜잡고 그의 어머니에게서 확 떼어 냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He grabbed Ben, wrenching him away from his mother. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Furious, his mother cut him out of her will. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 극도로 화가 난 그의 어머니는 그를 유언장에서 빼 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Furious, his mother cut him out of her will. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She closely resembled her mother at the same age. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그 나이 때의 어머니를 아주 많이 닮아 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She closely resembled her mother at the same age. Add to Wordbook
